SELECT
FROM t_house_asset JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_asset.building_id = t_house_property_building.id JOIN t_house_property_building_unit on t_house_asset.unit_id = t_house_property_building_unit.id JOIN t_house_design_model ON t_house_property_building_unit.design_model_id = t_house_design_model.id JOIN t_house_decorate_plan ON t_house_decorate_plan.design_model_id = t_house_design_model.id JOIN t_house_decorate_plan_funiture ON t_house_decorate_plan.id = t_house_decorate_plan_funiture.decorate_plan_id JOIN t_house_property_community ON t_house_property_community.id=t_house_property_building.community_id WHERE t_house_asset.id=#{assetId} GROUP BY t_house_asset.id

SELECT ,t_end_user.name AS username,t_end_user.avatar AS userAvatar,t_end_user.phone AS phone FROM t_house_user_asset JOIN t_house_asset ON t_house_user_asset.asset_id=t_house_asset.id JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_asset.building_id = t_house_property_building.id JOIN t_house_property_community ON t_house_property_community.id = t_house_property_building.community_id JOIN t_house_property_building_unit ON t_house_property_building_unit.building_id=t_house_property_building.id JOIN t_end_user ON t_end_user.id = t_house_user_asset.user_id LEFT JOIN t_house_design_model on t_house_design_model.id = t_house_property_building_unit.design_model_id WHERE t_house_user_asset.rent_status=#{status}
and (t_house_property_community.address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_house_property_community.community LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_house_property_building.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_house_design_model.house_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_house_asset.floor LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_house_asset.number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%'))
and (t_end_user.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{username},'%') OR t_end_user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{username},'%'))
